description:
The balena CLI is a Command Line Interface for balenaCloud or openBalena.

The balena CLI is a Command Line Interface for balenaCloud or openBalena.
It is a software tool available for Windows, macOS and Linux, used through a command prompt / terminal window.
It can be used interactively or invoked in scripts.
The balena CLI builds on the balena API and the balena SDK, and can also be directly imported in Node.js applications.
The balena CLI is an open-source project on GitHub, and your contribution is also welcome!
df1bf2f (release list: Replace the semver field with raw_vesrion, 2025-09-02)
21bf25f (release: Replace the semver field with raw_vesrion, 2025-09-02)
e2c6f85 (release: Include the build_log in the --json results, 2025-09-02)
3d84d13 (Drop the 'balena os build-config' command in favor of balena config generate', 2025-09-01) a2846e76 (os configure: Drop the --version flag & fail when the image version can't be detected, 2025-09-01) 5ca2b07d (os configure, os initialize: Fail when a device-type.json can't be detected in the provided image, 2025-09-01) 2ab5bc17 (os configure: Make --config incompatible with all other flags other than --system-connection, 2025-09-02) 7a84cac9 (Extract parts of os configure, 2025-09-03) 91f217ea (device init: Validate that the provided config file paths exist, 2025-09-03) 0c969e67 (device init: Make --config incompatible with all other flags other than --drive --version & --yes, 2025-09-03) e551af5a (Replace custom versioncommand with@oclif/plugin-version, 2025-09-03) 8ea0f3ac (Replace manual completion generation with @oclif/plugin-autocomplete`, 2025-09-03)
a4aaebb (Use oclif's native json support instead of manually adding it, 2025-09-03)
5a0bc30 (Drop all deprecated aliases, 2025-09-03)
7d8f5d6 (os configure: Add tests for how flags are allowed to be combined, 2025-09-09)
fa020b4 (os configure: Use oclif relations to enforce --device-type dependency on --fleet, 2025-09-09)
3bc2261 (config generate: Drop the deprecated no-op '--generate-device-api-key' flag, 2025-09-10)
acf6e70 (Drop support for node <24.11.0, 2025-09-12)
684c2a9 (device init: Fix node DEP0190 deprecation warning, 2025-09-12)
db5a67a (device note: Drop the --dev flag in favor of the standardize --device, 2025-11-13)
fd5f06d (Fix lzma-native build on node24 on Linux ARM runners, 2025-11-14)
c132e8d (Deduplicate dependencies, 2025-11-17)
